@graph.name: Shopify Product ID Finder & Guide
@graph.description: Complete guide and tool for finding, using, and managing Shopify Product IDs. Learn how to extract product IDs from admin, API, and browser methods.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
featureList: Find Product IDs from Shopify Admin

audience.audienceType: Shopify Store Owners, Developers, E-commerce Managers

@graph.name: How to Find and Use Shopify Product IDs
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to finding and using Shopify Product IDs for store management

step.name: Access Shopify Admin
step.text: Log in to your Shopify account and navigate to the Shopify admin dashboard

step.name: Navigate to Products
step.text: Go to the Products Page in your Shopify Admin

step.name: Select Product
step.text: Click on the product you want to see

step.name: Extract ID from URL
step.text: Look at the browser's address bar. The numbers after /products/ are the Product ID

mainEntity.name: What is a Shopify Product ID?

acceptedAnswer.text: A Shopify Product ID is a unique number assigned to each product when you create it in your Shopify store. It's used to manage product data, automate processes through the Shopify API, and manage inventory for specific products and variants.

mainEntity.name: How do I find a Product ID in Shopify Admin?

acceptedAnswer.text: Navigate to Products in your Shopify Admin, click on a product, and look at the browser's address bar. The numbers after /products/ in the URL are the Product ID.

mainEntity.name: What's the difference between Product ID and Variant ID?

acceptedAnswer.text: A Product ID is unique to each product, while Variant IDs are unique codes for different versions of the same product (like size or color variations).

mainEntity.name: Can I get Product IDs via API?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can get Product IDs using the Shopify API by sending a GET request to /admin/api/2023-01/products.json endpoint. The response includes product IDs in JSON format.

@graph.name: Shopify Product ID Guide - Find and Use Product IDs
@graph.description: Complete guide for finding and using Shopify Product IDs. Learn admin methods, API extraction, and practical applications for store management.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Product ID
hasDefinedTerm.description: A unique numeric code assigned to every product in a Shopify store for identification and management purposes

hasDefinedTerm.name: Variant ID
hasDefinedTerm.description: Unique codes for different versions of the same product, such as different sizes or colors

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify API
hasDefinedTerm.description: Application Programming Interface that allows developers to interact with Shopify store data programmatically

hasDefinedTerm.name: Bulk Editing
hasDefinedTerm.description: The process of making changes to multiple products simultaneously using their Product IDs
